high_descs: Turn right toward the bath tub.  Walk toward the bath tub and turn left facing the toilet.  Walk toward the toilet.
Pick up the soap container on the wall of the bath tub.
Turn left and walk toward the wall.  Turn right at the wall and walk toward the trash can.
Put the soap container in the trash can.
anns.task_desc: Put the soap container in the trash.

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the bathtub then turn left  and face the toilet
Pick up the bottle of soap that is sitting on the side of the bathtub
Turn left and head across the room then turn right and walk to the wall, turn right again to face the side of the toilet
Place the soap bottle in the trash can that is sitting next to the toilet and underneath the toilet paper holder.
anns.task_desc: Place a bottle of soap into a trash can

high_descs: Turn right and walk to the front of the toilet.
Pick up the soap dispenser from the side of the bathtub.
Walk to the left side of the toilet.
Put the soap dispenser in the trash can next to the toilet.
anns.task_desc: Put a soap dispenser in the trash.
